#state-title: State pattern implementation in a game-like window application
#state-p1: Trying to demonstrate the state pattern in a visual manner, this project involves a very simple Java swing application where you can notice 'the change of states' suffered by the DoomGuy character when buttons are clicked; Changing between states: normal, hurt, poisoned and dead. This application is not a game, it just illustrates the pattern and how the changes act upon a context object.
